description: Recreate the Churrascaria at home with this sweet and sticky Brazilian BBQ feast.
keywords: Skewer & kebab,Wheat free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Beef,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Brazilian Meat Skewers with Pork Tenderloin & A Steakhouse Marinade Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1.3-plus one extra tsp cup cola (plus one extra tsp)

recipeInstructions.text: Combine all ingredients until they are mixed well and the meat is well covered. Cover the bowl and leave to marinate in the fridge overnight.
Next day, heat up your BBQ or chargrill. Skewer the marinated pork onto sticks and fry for 12 minutes while rotating or until the meat is cooked fully.
Serve skewered with a choice of condiments or chillies.
